sentences.en: Causing evacuation, especially of the bowels; purgative.
sentences.cn: 排泄的,排除的引起腹泻, 尤指肠泻的; 净肠的.

sentences.en: He was given a purgative before the operation.
sentences.cn: 他在手术前用了通便药.

sentences.en: One was to bring down the fever , another a purgative, the third to an acid condition.
sentences.cn: 一种是退烧的,一种是泄药, 另一种是用来去酸的.该句中, 注意列举三个东西的方法.

sentences.en: Take some purgative and it will help you purge your bowels of bad matter.
sentences.cn: 吃点泻药有助于你将肠胃中的有害物质除去.

sentences.en: The doctors attempted to reduce his high fever by inducing diarrhea with a purgative.
sentences.cn: 医生们尝试用通便药物催泻以使他退烧。

sentences.en: The popular idea of recession as purgative - the hangover following an ill - and enduring emotional appeal.
sentences.cn: 这种把衰退看作泻药的观点 - 类似于狂欢后的酩酊大醉 - 有着强烈并且持久的情感吸引力.

sentences.en: The popular idea of recession as purgative an ill - judged binge - has a strong and enduring emotional appeal.
sentences.cn: 衰退就像不顾后果狂饮后宿醉时的泻药,这种流行观念有着强烈并持久的情感诉求.

sentences.en: The thesis has also analyzed the prescription mentality purgative recipes of warm nature.
sentences.cn: 本研究还分析了温下剂的处方思路.
